concept.title: File and folder naming conventions
concept.shortdesc: Using an , well-documented file naming and folder structure convention will improve the usability of the authoring process for DITA authors, especially those working in a team.

conbody.p: Use descriptive folder and file names. Use .dita as the file extension for topic files, and .ditamap for ditamap files. File names are case-sensitive, and lower case file names are preferred. Prefix topic names with a letter corresponding to their information type.
